data.title: An Australian Mafia boss allegedly paid $2.2 million in bribes to NSW judges to get lighter jail sentences, top-secret police intelligence reports reveal.

Jihadi preacher Hani al-Sibai who described the 7/7 terror attacks in London in 2005 as a ‘great victory’ lives in £1 million ($1,555,800.00) five bedroom home in West London with £50,000 a year in handouts from the government, who is unable to deport him.
London is the world’s leading city for laundering drug money
